website_summaries.verdict: Designed with runners and outdoor enthusiasts in mind, this gel spray causes instant incapacitation when applied to face or skin.
pros: Releases a steady wind-resistant stream of gel that won't blow into your face
cons: Some report the button is difficult to press

customer_reviews.title: Took out my daughter's  boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Ok. You can't make this up. My daughter was in a lovers' spat with her 18 year old boyfriend and accidentally sprayed him in the face while intentionally threatening to spray him in the face with the pepper spray I just bought her to take to college. Long story short, said boyfriend not only vomited but sobbed in crippling pain. About 45 minutes later and after a shower, he returned to functionality. Needless to say, ill rest a little easier knowing she has this protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has already proven to be worth the money. We've had a couple of car jackings at local gas stations and pan handling has gotten way out of control. Tonight I was pumping gas and had this in my hand when I was approached by a random, sketchy guy. He asked me for money and wouldn't leave looking inside my locked car. When I showed that I had mace in my hand and aimed it toward him, he said, "No problem, God bless" And immediately walked away. I am so glad i had this and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Learn to use this product as it is intended people!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every female should have pepper spray with them at all times and know how to use it. I live in a big city and walk everywhere, and let me just put a PSA out there - the proper way to use pepper spray is to actually have it IN HAND when you are alone and it is dark or you feel vulnerable. Just don’t even bother buying it if your plan is to throw it in the bottom of your purse and then ask your attacker to wait a sec while you dig through your make up and old receipts to find your defensive weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: This product saved me from 2 pit bulls that charged me during a morning run through the country side. I will never run without it again. I wish it’s range was further but once it hit the snout they changed their mind real fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brooks

customer_reviews.title: HATE!!
customer_reviews.text: HATE!! As a victim of being attacked from behind in a parking lot, having to slide sprayer and use bionic thumbs to depress is ludicrous! You have seconds to react and better make sure you are a good aim. Women use their index fingers..The fact that the spray closes easily is also insane. I practically used all this up testing it.......Buy the other Sabre spray.. ...a little more cumbersome in the palm of hand but depresses easily and ready to go. Also gives you enough to test..
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle falls off
customer_reviews.text: The hand strap is cool. On my second early morning run, however, the red nozzle fell off. I found it on my second time, in the dark, back tracking. So, what, the nozzle could now fall off at any time? I have to constantly keep my finger on the top? What is the purpose of the handstrap then? I'm unclear on how secure the nozzle will stay if I'm in a real emergency situation. So it's a hard pass on recommending this product. I'll have to purchase a separate spray. But I like the handstrap.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sage

customer_reviews.title: Dribbled
customer_reviews.text: Product would not spray - just dribbled out some drops. After the third try it did nothing at all. Based on other reviews, at least 10% of these items don't work. I bought it to spray on artificial plants in the house that I didn't want our new dog to chew on. Wound up buying Cayenne pepper which worked fine,
customer_reviews.author: David J Zaring

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke? Packaging comes opened already and no expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to purchase a brand new self-defense tool for it to be just wrapped in bubble wrap and the paper crinkled around it. Nothing about this says "This is unused and safe to use." Also, where the heck is the Expiration Date? These things last 2-4 years but there is nothing on the paper or spray itself that says when it was made or when it expires. Absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Trigger sticks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to keep with me when cycling. The trigger sticks! I needed it because a dog was chasing me and it wouldn't spray. I've tried experimenting with it a couple times and it always sticks. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. While jogging this morning I had a mid-size dog run up to me. I sprayed the dog in his eyes, mouth, nose, everywhere in the face and the dog didnt even flinch...he kept coming at me...I eventually had to kick it to get it to go away....save your money and buy a sprayer and fill it with water....you will get the same affect..
customer_reviews.author: Gralin Gassiott

customer_reviews.title: The problem I have is the safety lock is too loose and opens on it's own.  I become the target!
customer_reviews.text: I am Extremely uncomfortable carrying this on my backpack strap because the safety lock is very loose and too easily opened. The first day I attached it and had walked less than a half mile, I looked down and saw the nozzle pointing right at me!! That is not acceptable! I can not carry it in a pocket, on a belt loop, or backpack strap without it opening up. I tried all of these methods and finally put it in a plastic bag to keep it from discharging and ruining MY day! I cannot carry it on my hand when I am hiking, so this is not a good tool for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Worked to defend aginst dogs, for a single use only.
customer_reviews.text: It did work the first time and allowed my wife to successfully repel two large, aggressive dogs. Our dog was defending her, but he want going to be able to hold out long against the two larger dogs. She sprayed the dogs as quickly s possible (about 6 seconds) and somehow didn't get any on our dog. The two attacking dogs immediately ran off to the private property they had been allowed to escape from. Even more amazing was that our dog was uninjured! But the second time the dogs were encountered, the spray did not work. The sound of the can and the smell did work to deter the dogs, along with yelling commands at them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Holster in unreliable during transport
customer_reviews.text: It’s all pointless if it keeps slipping out of it’s holster during transport. Have it attached to my key ring so that I can find it on the way to work my overnight shift. Usually have to rifle though my bag to find it, anyway. Feeling Sabre Red will be no where to be found when I need it the most. One night had it strapped to my hand; it just slipped out of the holster rolled behind me. Great peripheral vision’s the only thing that alerted me to it’s displacement. Back to the drawing board! :/
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: so now I am defenseless and wasted 10 dollars on something that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: this does not work. I can hear that there is liquid inside, but mine doesn't work, so now I am defenseless and wasted 10 dollars on something that doesn't work. Save your money and go with another brand/type.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A Terrible Design -- Lock Feature is Useless
customer_reviews.text: The "lock feature" on this spray can design is terrible. It is ridiculously easy for the trigger mechanism to slip off the safety setting and onto the ready-to-fire setting -- without the user even realizing it. That puts the user in danger of a face full of pepper gel. I wish I could rate this thing zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rodwally

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running companion!
customer_reviews.text: I carry this pepper gel spray whenever I go trail running - or other locations where there may be dogs, animals, or crazy people. Fortunately, I've never had to use it, so I actually don't know how well it works... I've come close to using it a couple times on unleashed dogs, but, fortunately, everything has worked out well so far. Still, it's comforting to know that I have it with me, just in case. NOTE: don't try to bring this into Canada - I was surprised to discover that it's prohibited and will be confiscated. Evidently, Canada likes their citizens to be vulnerable and potential victims. Glad I don't live there.
customer_reviews.author: DR Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to use it today. I was definitely glad I had it. I was wondering if it would work on dogs, and yep. I hear something behind me and turned as the pit jump at my face and began barking. I sprayed it at him and he took one more step at me I began spraying again and he turned and ran away. I will be ordering another container since I don't know how much I used, Sprayed alot and even after he turned.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Worthless and more worthless
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to walk with, mostly to use against human predators. Tried it the day it arrived. I have to really really press hard, then it squirts a little bit out, not even a stream of liquid, more like a big drip. If a scumbag were after me I’d have to ask them to “wait a minute, takes a bit for this thing to work, and would you please put your face closer”. Well you get the drift. This is a for sure, get what you pay for kinda deal. Threw it in the trash, for $10, too much trouble to return. Will look for another one elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KAYLA W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. Product dribbled out when lever was held down. Read instructions again to make sure I was doing it right. Super disappointed, and I cannot even return this item! :(
customer_reviews.author: Luna Bretzke

customer_reviews.title: Will not spray using the tab, Must press the center of the button?
customer_reviews.text: I was attacked by 4 dogs tonight, so I took this out to spray them - nothing came out of the canister. Thank God I had my older one that was already half empty or I would have been bit by all of the dogs. As it was, it was difficult to deter 4 dogs at one time. ***amended: If you press the center of the button, it will spray - but it's supposed to work by pushing the tab to open and then pressing the tab to spray. This is not how this one is working. Could be defective. I hope there is a way to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: RayLinStephens

customer_reviews.title: Worked on a St. Bernard dog trying to attack my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Will buy it again. I will never leave on another dog walk without it. A St. Bernard tried to attack my dogs. It worked great and the dog went home. The lady got a ticket and I made it home safely with my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this on a pit bull that was coming after me on a bike ride. The dog was within 5ft when I sprayed it. The spray hit the dog in the face and it definitely ended the attack. The only negative is that the stream wasn't very strong. I don't know if the stream would've reached 10ft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: The SECURITY I feel can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: I can only say that as I haven't had to USE this tool yet (as in spraying an attacking rottweiler), I'm assuming it will work when called upon. But I CAN say that 1) I'm not afraid to walk now and that 2) it fits just wonderfully in my palm, and I am not hesitant at all to point and shoot. Also, 3) it helps me to know that I'm protected in the event it becomes necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed some on the ground and couldn't detect any irritant. So I sprayed it on a fence and put my nose right up to it. No irritation. I wiped it onto my fingers, still nothing. I actually wiped it onto my upper lip, right below my nose. No irritation. My skin tingles a little, but it's far less irritating than a freshly cut onion. This is a dangerous product because it will give you a false sense of safety. I have had other pepper spray products in the past, and after spraying them in the grass you couldn't get within a foot of them without being overpowered by the burning sensation. This is complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: No qualtiy control
customer_reviews.text: No quality control. Ordered three, one was dead on arrival, the second one does not spray ten feet, and I am afraid to try the third one. The spray is so fine that you cannot see where it is going. SABRE has a good name but if you get a dead one they will not return or replace. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly repelled a VERY large dog
customer_reviews.text: I carry this while running, and I had a very large dog come after me during a run the other night. I was able to side step the dog and quickly deploy this spray as the dog was coming back towards me at less than an arms length away. I have been carrying this for years, but this was the first time I had to use it. The dog quickly retreated and I was amazed at how quickly and easily I was able to deploy it. It was instinctual and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: My first disappointing Sabre product
customer_reviews.text: I've had many Sabre pepper sprays and this one seems to be much more difficult to press down. I purchased 2 of these and they were both difficult to press. I'd rather pay more money and get the Sabre flip top one which is much easier but not as concealable, which is better than having a smaller one that is hard to spray.
customer_reviews.author: C. ling

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for runners, it makes me feel a little safer during my runs! It’s lightweight, easy to hold and to use. However the quality of the strap isn’t the best. I would also recommend using some lubricant around your hand if you’re going for a long run to prevent chafing. Overall I think it’s a great product. Try practicing shooting at a target and remember to always be alert of your surroundings, avoid listening to music, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Torua

customer_reviews.title: Nearly useless
customer_reviews.text: The trigger is hard to push. I tried test firing it and finally got it to trigger. When I tried test firing it while I was running, it barely spit out any product and then stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Pig_Weasley

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet and hope I never will. Tested it to make sure it works. Update, tested it one time, one short spray and now it's empty. Maybe it evaporates?? Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SMTN

customer_reviews.title: Item indicates it “Comes w/ Optional SABRE Personal Alarm w/ Clip & LED Light...”.  It Does Not.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of the runner pepper gel sprays. Two pink and two black. The items indicate that they come with optional SABRE personal alarm with clip and LED light. It does not. Previous answers to similar inquiries suggest there are several options to select from which include the personal alarm and LED light. There are not any options offered except pink or black. I think that the SABRE runner spray is a good product but I’m very disappointed that the alarm and light aren’t included as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay  Morris

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, was defective upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the pouch that holds the pepper spray tore out the first time I put the spray back in, thus rendering this pretty much useless. The item is not returnable, so I'm stuck. If a dog comes after me on my next run I will throw the pouch at it to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous does NOT spray !!
customer_reviews.text: Again did not do my due diligence in buying on Amazon. No return policy on this useless item. I unlocked, relocked and unlocked to test before using as quasi protection on my outdoor walk and NOTHING comes out. And if history serves 3rd party vendors do NOTHING to address their malfunctioning items. Maybe Sabre Red will be different but if they cared it would be easier to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: EG09

customer_reviews.title: Breaks with one drop
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this even worked, never gave it a try. It has been in my purse, but I took it out to hold it just in case, and blam, one drop and it breaks! What a rip off! $10 down the drain! What good is a warranty if you can't fire the thing??
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: Changed my level of confidence!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I carry it when I go for dog walks. It's really easy and comfortable to hold. In fact you don't really have to "hold" it at all. It fits perfectly in your hand and is held there with a Velcro strap. There are a lot of irresponsible dog owners where I live and we love to walk. I was transferring my concern to my dog and she is already dealing with some fear aggression. Having this pepper spray has had a very unexpected effect, I feel so confident and secure that we are safe and that transfers right down to my girl. Our walks have been really enjoyable since having this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Must have for biking/running
customer_reviews.text: This product works surprisingly well in my experience. As much as I hate to say I've already had to use it since purchasing this pepper spray, I have, and every time it's put what I've had to spray off of continuing instantly. The range is impressive, and as advertised it doesn't get affected by wind as much as you would imagine, meaning you can be reasonably accurate. The bonus is how powerful this stuff is. This product starts working instantly... I know because I had my friend spray me in the face so I know how it felt... and boy does it hurt! This is definitely not a product I would willingly point at somebody unless I absolutely had to.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very discreet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my commutes to/from work very early or very late (in the dark) - I work hospital shifts. It is very small and comfortable to hold in your hand without it being noticeable. My only wish is that the red lock tab would somehow "snap" into place, because I find it too easily moves into the "use" position and I am a little nervous about it spraying accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Majors

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Cam opened and used. Didn’t order a used one. Didn’t get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: SABRE RED Pepper Gel Spray for Runners
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading reviews. I wanted something that I could put in car and carry from when I got out. I like the strap for the hand which makes it feel more secure. They lock is a little funky to get used to and sometimes becomes disengaged when in my pocket. That is because it was probably not made to be carried in pocket. But when carried as designed, in hand, there is never any problem. Bought one for family member also. Safety is important.
customer_reviews.author: gene botwright

customer_reviews.title: Great defense!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't play around. The pepper is red, from red pepper flakes and that stuff will hurt. Havnt used it on anyone thankfully, but the locking mechanism could use some work, because when I clip it to my belt, I've seen it move from my waist movement. Also the strap is wearing out, making it look frayed. Otherwise, very much recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: John Orlando

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend
customer_reviews.text: This pepper jelly mace is awesome and really strong if you use it make sure it’s for sure far away from your face the mace is really strong and it makes you sneeze that’s how strong it is do recommend if your looking for some great defense spray the lows is the way you have to use it if in an emergency to use the twist top is kind of confusing because you can’t twist it fast enough to use in an emergency that’s it other than that great spray
customer_reviews.author: Drucilla Houston

customer_reviews.title: Better than carrying a gun
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Non-lethal. If you think a gun is better you have not thought through what happens after you shoot someone. (eg. legal, mental, acts of revenge-- it will never be over). Most gun experts point this out and recommend pepper gel spray for general self defense use, especially for those who do not regularly use a firearm. Note: best to use a series of short bursts from the pepper gel. We have these in all of our vehicles and all of our regular places of habitation (house, work, RV, etc). We especially like the velcro hand strap for running, exercise and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Nevadaflyboy

customer_reviews.title: Haven't needed it, but peace of mind is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I go for walks often, and there are some sketchier parts you need to cross to get to the trails. I have not had to use this, so I cannot talk about its effectiveness (I did shoot it at a fence post just to find the proper positioning in my hand, and it traveled a good distance). Holding it though, it is comfortable, unassuming and sturdy. Locking and unlocking can be done with the holding hand by sliding your thumb to disengage the red tab away from the locked position, then press it down to shoot. I feel confident with it, and hope never to have to use it. But glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: TatiannaJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I haven't had to use this pepper spray yet. I run alone in the woods a lot though and this definitely makes me feel safer. I tested it when it first arrives and it sprays. I like the little holster it has. I velcro it to the running belt that I use to hold my phone and it stays in place great. Barely notice it's there. The lock function is a little sketchy, it slips pretty easily back and forth between the locked and unlocked positions. I would be concerned about this if I was carrying it in a purse or bag, but it doesn't really matter for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mayer

customer_reviews.title: YOU DON'T HAVE TO FUMBLE FOR IT
customer_reviews.text: OLD TYPE WHERE YOU HAVE TO SEARCH FOR DOESN'T MAKE SENSE. BY THE TIME YOU TRY TO FIND YOU WILL BE ASSAULTED. LOVE MY NEW ONE. IT IS ON MY HAND AT ALL TIMES, INTO ANY STORE. OUT OF MY CAR. NEVER WITHOUT OUT.
customer_reviews.author: hunky

customer_reviews.title: The guy that got sprayed even said it sucked, but it has enough KICK to stop a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2016 used it a 4 days before this review! Saved me from getting physical with this homeless man who is old enough to be my dad. However, I gave it 4 stars because it's a spray and it did work but I was hoping more of a blast. The guy that got sprayed even said it sucked, but it has enough KICK to stop a fight! Also, he took off his jacket and that's how I know it got him. He walked off and that was that. THANKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used this for 3 years against dogs when jogging but now can't get it shipped to CA !
customer_reviews.text: what the heck !? this has saved me many times from dogs attacking me & now they want my driver's license & personal info to veryify I'm of "age" & then of course I live in California, why the sudden change ???? Yes, you do have to stand still & aim this but I'd rather face a crazed dog than have it get me while m back is turned !
customer_reviews.author: BookshireCrone

customer_reviews.title: but I like this one better than the last one I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it (and hope I never do), but I like this one better than the last one I had (which was a keychain). It has a velcro stretchy strap that fits in your hand. It's great for running or moving around with while still being discrete. No danger of dropping it while running, bike riding, sitting on the bus. Easy button, fits thumb well, has a safety on it. It's also a gel which means it's more focused on your target instead of getting everyone in the area. I think everyone should have one. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E.C. McRoy

customer_reviews.title: Precarious Safety Lock
customer_reviews.text: it not even a "lock"... the safety freely slides into the on position way too easy... eventually its going to misfire in my opinion. I am wary of keeping it in my pocket as multiple times when I pull it out... its already slid into the firing position. Outside of that seems great but that is a very important facet of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jaus

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: too easy to use, lock slips and spins on its own..seems to want to slide out of holder..keep away from children and pets...I gave it away to a coworker..spend a little more...not worth it
customer_reviews.author: troyboy

customer_reviews.title: Not really a gell
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this on dogs that were attacking me. I had thought from the pictures and description it was a gel that was red, it was neither. It is just a typical pepper spray like many others I have used. The range was about 7 feet but did reach the attacking dogs in plenty of time. I cant give it 5 stars as it was not as advertised but it was effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Compact
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to use it. I am a retired Deputy and when I was on duty I carried Sabre Red. I solo hike a lot in the mountains and desert and I wanted something for non-lethal for protection. I also bought one for my wife. I almost used it once when a leashed Pit Bull lunged at me on a trail. Luckily for the owner he was able to retrain the dog. My advice to people who carry this product-KNOW HOW TO USE IT! Practice "drawing" it. Muscle memory is necessary in a volatile situation.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for the better half. No issues with the spray itself
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the better half. No issues with the spray itself, but the stitching on the elastic strap is so bad that it immediately fell apart upon removal from the packaging. The velcro strip isn't aligned or sewn correctly. No point in purchasing this with the strap if it isn't even going to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: jdoughy

customer_reviews.title: Defective lock mechanism, no returns. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: DEFECTIVE product, no returns!!! Lock mechanism slides open and closed when tilted, this is not safe. I commute to/from work on bike, but also need to be able to put it in my bike bag at home when not in use. Locking mechanism could slide open and spray when stored, and not even remotely safe around kids. Dissatisfied. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: lock feature
customer_reviews.text: It's sleek, light, great option of colors, however, the lock doesn't firmly lock in place and can easily move to the on position. It's more like you are switching the lever to press left or right to not activate it, or make it go off. That's the only flaw. It's great to carry, but be careful if you are using your hands touch it a lot in your pockets as the lock is not really secure.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not a great locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and simple to use. The Locking mechanism requires re-engineering. If left in a pocket it will rotate to the trigger position too easily. Best if kept in a bag with a Specialized or perfectly size pocket until you will either be holding it in your hand or use. A little small for $10 but who wants to run with a 24 oz can of pepper spray?
customer_reviews.author: Big Dollahs

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and added security. I do not go out without this.
customer_reviews.text: Do some searches on YouTube for proper instructions and use. I do not go out without it. If you have to use familiarize your self with the safety feature which you turn slightly to unlock point or aim for the eyes and do a sweeping side to side. Lightweight. I removed it from the strap as I have a fanny pack with a holder for just this. No woman or teenage should be without. Great price, fast shipping. Check your shelf life. Will order another for my mom's purse. Again you want any product like this where you can get to it fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use this but it's easy to carry. When I used to carry it in my pocket I noticed sometimes the "lock" feature was in the unlocked state due to moving around in my pocket. That's a little worrisome so I moved it to an outside pocket of my bag where it's been ever since. Seems pretty good for what it is. Mostly I carry it for use on unleashed dogs after two attacked me one night. I was able to scare them off without injury but after that I wanted some defense.
customer_reviews.author: Peridot Antlers

customer_reviews.title: Trigger safety is unsafe
customer_reviews.text: The lock on the trigger is way too easy to unlock. If you put this in your pocket, you will probably spray the pocket
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Rehmus

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work when i needed it to!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it not spray the dog chasing me, it oozed all over my hand. Buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: brett rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Locking mechanism doesn’t snap locked, so in my pocket it sometimes slides to spray position. Fortunately it hasn’t accidentally been pressed and sprayed in my pocket. I thought it came with clip for belt but it doesn’t and I don’t like keeping it in my hand when I hike. I still feel safer having it on me, for those wild animals that are out there ready to eat me. Or crazy protesters.
customer_reviews.author: Martinx

customer_reviews.title: Works great when you get one that works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same model at Cabela's and it worked fine. Had to use this one from Amazon today and got only a very weak spray. I almost got bit. This product seems to be hit or miss, so do not trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I run several times a week on a bike path or on country roads. I don't like to carry my phone, so I thought this might be good for protection from an attacker and also stray dogs. I am pleased with how light weight it is and easy to carry in the palm of your hand while running. I purchased 2 one for myself and one for my daughter. It arrived within a few days and also had well written instructions. I will definitely feel a little more safe.
customer_reviews.author: Hubnaumic

customer_reviews.title: Great running gadget
customer_reviews.text: Running early in the morning I needed something to protect myself. This gadget is amazing. It straps onto my hand really easily and I don’t feel it. I feel though it would be hard in the moment of an attack to switch it over to spray. So I automatically have it switched over to do so and then I switch it back when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Randi888

customer_reviews.title: Cheap protection in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I order a new container of this pepper spray every year. My wife and I carry it when walking our dog. I have had to use it one time when our dog was attacked by another dog. It took a few tries to get the spray in the dogs face but once I did, there was no fight left in that dog. I like the idea of my wife carrying this for personal protection when she is on her walks with or without the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Skeezix

customer_reviews.title: I use when Running in sh*tty places
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to feel a little bit safer when I run in bad neighborhoods. It is small, discrete and lightweight. I really like it. I Haven't used it. I have flipped the switch from lock to unlock a few times just to get some muscle memory going just in case I ever have to use it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieinthesky

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used SABRE pepper spray in the past without problem. This one is VERY hard to spray. I need both hands to spray. This sprays straight out in one stream so you have to be precise in your aim. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, does not work after 1 test spray
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and comes with nice Velcro strap, but that is all worthless if the product wont work as intended. I sprayed it at the ground just to test it and a nice stream came out. Sprayed in the air for a 2nd test and it no longer worked. Instead, liquid oozed out of the hole and covered my hand. This waste of money, do not take the gamble. Imagine in a real dangerous situation I tried using this thing and instead liquid oozed onto my hand. Can't believe this right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY CONVENIENT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVEN'T HAD TO SPRAY IT YET. THANK GOODNESS, BUT A WHILE BACK I WAS ATTACKED BY A LARGE DOG... I WAS CARRYING MY PEPPER SPRAY IN MY HAND AS I ALWAYS DID, BUT THE FORCE OF THE DOG KNOCKED ME DOWN AND MY PEPPER SPARY I WAS HOLDING IN MY HAND WENT FLYING AND I WAS WITHOUT DEFENSE SO THIS ONE, SECURED TO MY HAND IS A GREAT SAFTY FEATURE,,, I SEE NOW THAT HOLDING A DEFENSE SPRAY IS NOT GOOD, IT MUST ME SECURED TO YOU.
customer_reviews.author: cookster

customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet and I hope I don't have to. It's on my key chain and it is locked in place but I've notice it tends to slip out of the stretchy holder a little bit and the lock feature doesn't quite work because it slowly slides toward the unlocked position and I have to check it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Irish gal

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Life
customer_reviews.text: This saved my life today. A 100 pound German Shepard came charging at me today on my run. Teeth out, growling, barking the whole 9. I yelled as loud as I could BACK UP and sprayed. Stopped it dead in its tracks. Ran to a patch of grass and started rubbing its face. I put my soul back in my body and got out of there!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Zalazar

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I've had to use this twice on stray dogs that have approached me while I'm walking my dogs. Both times the spray hit them far enough away that we were never in danger. I particularly like the velcro wristband on this one. I used to use a lanyard to hold the device and it would keep falling off. This is a much more secure method and I can access the mace in literally two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: P. Browning

customer_reviews.title: top spray red button loose
customer_reviews.text: I had to use the mace today, it's brand new. I had to try and spray 3-4 times the red top was loose it wouldn't spray. no good, I need it to work the first time-----------Phil
customer_reviews.author: Phil Tully

customer_reviews.title: did not get as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pepper spray with hand strap for runners...... I got a red white and blue canister of pepper spray with a clip ( a clip that u use for a shirt pocket....like one on a pen!)....Not convenient to hold and run with as u are now having to maintain a tight fist as u run...... Not happy with the bait and switch on how order was filled. Sent an email to Sabre customer service , but have not heard back
customer_reviews.author: Angela L

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for that special someone..
customer_reviews.text: Im waiting for that special someone to come try me, because i will unleash this miniature hell onto their retinas and laugh at their miserable painful existence. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! and it comes with a little wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Razersnek

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed because when I test sprayed it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed because when I test sprayed it, I noticed that it runs down the side of the pouch and container and onto my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Stay safe at night or anytime
customer_reviews.text: Love this mace for late night walks with our dog! Easy to hold without worrying about dropping it. Update a year later: still using this mace for myself and our older teens when they walk to and from work. It is so easy to hold in your hand. We have had some strange moments but never had to use it. It is nice knowing it is available if needed. We do check it in the grass from time to time. It is small and easy to conceal so not everyone knows you have it. Love that it is black to as not to draw attention. The strap is the winner here!
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Read, read, read!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3 times because I like the size, strap and easy to carry but the third order came out defective and does not shoot the liquid out, the red button seam to be jammed and the liquid just gushes out and gets over your fingers which irrates your skin. Hope I can get a new one since this one does not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jayman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Quality of Sabre products are usually very good. This is actually our third time purchasing the product. First two, no issues, this time the stitching on the handheld case is falling apart out of the bag. Very disappointed with the quality of the Sabre Pepper spray gel. No way to contact the seller prior to posting this issue. I will readjust if they contact me over this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, locking mechanism seems easy to unlock in a bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little unsure about the lock feature...it seems very easy to be knocked open in my bag. However, it seems easy enough to unlock in a pinch which I’m sure it was intended for. I haven’t had any mishaps so far, but it does make me nervous. Works exactly as intended and makes me feel better and more secure walking around at night knowing I have it in my purse! The hand strap is a plus so I know I’m gripping it facing the right direction and not at myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have this for protection
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet....hope I never do. I often walk early in the morning and I feel safer having this with me. I also like having the gel instead of the regular pepper spray that I heard could blow back if it's windy. Our area (SoCal) is also affected by coyotes who mostly avoid people so it's nice to have this just in case I encounter one or more who want to approach me, particularly if I'm walking my dog.
customer_reviews.author: I B

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for personal protection. Both of them worked for the first test, but only one worked for the second test. The failed one seemed to have run out of propellant after the first use. I decided to throw out both and try a different product rather than risk product failure if I need it in a dangerous situation.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool To Carry
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but I like that it is gel instead of spray and there are plenty of uses in the bottle. The UV marking dye is a nice added feature. The runners grip is the best part as you can secure it to your hand or slip it off if not needed. From my research it's good enough for many law enforcement agencies, so it should be good enough for me. It's a cheap Gadget that is meant to buy you a few seconds to escape a dire situation. Makes no sense not to carry one.
customer_reviews.author: BirdMan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the spray out
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product at least 3 times, because I take it with me on all hikes and walks. Unfortunately these had issues with releasing the spray. It was hard to get it to spray and then it sprayed in a long thin line. Not sure if that is what the spray should do. But in trying to get it to work, I have already used up one of the tubes. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great pepper spray for palm with hand strap!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great slim size. When you strap them to your hand, you can wrap your palm around them. I bought an extra one because I thought I lost the first one. Now I have one in my bag and one at home for intruders/home invasion. I wish I'd known about these when I was hiking and walking at the park by myself. I haven't tested them, but I trust the Sabre brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for each of my three daughters, taught them the basics on how to use, and now I sleep better knowing that my two college students (and even the high school student) have at least one very effective measure of self defense for use in trying circumstances. Plus, it's a gel not a spray, so no danger of back-spray on the user if there is a headwind when the sprayer is discharged.
customer_reviews.author: Miles B. Eggimann

customer_reviews.title: No problems ordering or receiving.
customer_reviews.text: Product is small which makes it convenient to carry. Have not needed to use the product and hopefully will never have to. If confronted with a bear or lion while early am hiking will definitely use the product. If the product works I will write about it. If the product doesn't work as expected you will likely never find out from me!
customer_reviews.author: rita martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very strong. Don't "practice" you dont want it on you.
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong. I do not recommend "practicing" unless you dispose of the canister. You don't want even a drop in your pocket. Ignor the video review where someone sprayed it and maybe some perhaps got into her eyes. It's entirely subjective. I had to wash my pants 4 times becasue residue kept burning my leg. The twist to use mechanism isn't ideal but it is strong stuff. Great for bad dogs. And their owners :)
customer_reviews.author: Andre W

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the strap on this pepper gel. It fits snugly in my hand, and I can easily flip the lock for access. Also, having it attached me to my palm makes it easy for me to hold my hand behind my head and spray anyone who would grab me from the back. I take with me when I walk and when I shop. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: KsGrl444

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a little practice shot into a napkin that I was holding in my hand. I know stupid thing to do. A tiny amount splashed back maybe like a couple drops. I was rinsing my eyes out for ten minutes. This stuff works. Burns like hell I can only imagine taking a direct shot. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bAssmaster

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good thing to have
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I didn’t get see it in action, but overall this spray seems to be a good thing to have in your pocket: easy to hold in your hand, and easy to unlock it with one thumb move. Just make sure you hold it in the right direction:)
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Welp. Thankfully have not had an occasion to use this. But I'm counting on it working if and when I do. It is easy to carry. I like the belt strap. I do feel safe carrying it. And I especially like there's no safety switch to mess with. You just push the button. After all who wants to mess with a safety switch at a critical moment?
customer_reviews.author: Pjm

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It sprays very far! Straight aim, it was fun for my brother and I to test (not at each other, at the direction of a tree far away). It isn't bulky and easy to hold, the strap can be adjusted and it's pretty useful. It does dribble a bit and that's a bit worrying, but it's just a few droplets.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: no red paint
customer_reviews.text: The handle is comfortable and one could spray without doing anything but hitting the button with your thumb. Always ready! The only reason I did not give it five stars is that my old sprayer actually sprayed red paint with it so it would mark the dog or attacker That made me feel a little more securer.. I did not spray it though so I cannot say if it works or not and hopefully will never find out.
customer_reviews.author: C Faith

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have a french bulldog and I take him on walks alot. I got this as an animal repellant. Unfortunately, the little case it comes with stretched out to a point of not securing the spray anymore, on to of that, the red tab on top to put the spray into the safety position fell off and I couldn't find it, which rendered this spray completely ineffective. The red tab is essentially the trigger mechanism and without it, the spray won't fire. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective useless! do try before use to insure it works
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly however the button doesn’t work nothing happens when you press the button defective ?? I think so not happy
customer_reviews.author: Osinice

customer_reviews.title: It might be good, but I don't know.  Lost it the first day out.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hiker, and wanted to try this as an alternative to my belt loop spray. I carried it on the outside of my hand with the strap in my palm, as the instructions suggest, along with my hiking poles. Somewhere along the way when shifting my grip I dropped it and didn't notice. I have zero chance of finding it in the woods. A little more velcro would be enough to wrap it around my wrist, where it belongs. I may buy another one and modify the strap, the product itself looked very nice. Too bad I didn't have it long enough to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hazen S Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: Release button on top of spray does not stay in the locked position. It slides over to the position where I can release the spray with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I carry this with me most of the time I’m out in public. I find it comfortable to hold and it’s very easy to go from locked to unlocked if I needed it, so far I have not. I tried it just to make sure it worked and how far it would spray. Very accurate. I have a sense of feeling safer when I have this. As a single woman I feel more confident with it and don’t restrict where I walk anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, like the safety locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well (I did a test spray) but I luckily have not had to use. I like the locking function and the carrying case. I wear it on my running belt. I can easily grab it from its case, flip off the safety, and run with it in hand in creepy areas on my running trail.
customer_reviews.author: lindagt

product_meta.title: SABRE RED Pepper Gel Spray for Runners – Gel is Safer – Maximum Police Strength OC Spray, Adjustable Hand Strap for Quick Access while Running – Optional Clip-on 120dB Personal Alarm w/LED Light
product_meta.description: Focus on your run while staying safe. Running is your time. It's your exercise and your place to get away. We like to hope you never have to use our pepper gel, but our SABRE RED Runner was designed to give you an extra level of security, without intruding into your run. The SABRE RED Runner Pepper Gel with Adjustable Hand Strap provides protection at your fingertips for quick access when you encounter a threat. With 35 bursts (5x other brands), this product provides protection against multiple threats in a powerful stream delivery to reduce wind blow-back and provides protection at a safe distance with its 12-foot (4 m) range. It also features a locking top mechanism that prevents accidental discharge. SABRE is the #1 pepper spray chosen by thousands of police departments and the leader in personal safety and self-defense products. With over 45 years of experience manufacturing pepper spray, SABRE is trusted by consumers and police officers worldwide. SABRE pepper sprays and gels are proudly manufactured in the U.S.A.
feature_bullets: #1 PEPPER SPRAY BRAND TRUSTED BY POLICE & CONSUMERS WORLDWIDE: Including New York P.D., Chicago P.D., and U.S. Marshals; RELIABLE & LONG-LASTING: Made in the U.S.A. with a 4-year shelf life (2X the industry standard) for the best self-protection available

GUARANTEED MAXIMUM STRENGTH: SABRE's professional-grade OC Spray is backed by our in-house HPLC lab testing, guaranteeing maximum heat and stopping power in every burst and eliminating the 30% failure rate experienced with other brands (U of Utah study)

GEL IS SAFER TO USE ON A RUN: Pepper gel does not atomize like traditional pepper spray and deploys in a powerful stream with a 20% greater range (12 feet / 4 m); It only affects the target, and virtually eliminates wind blow-back

PROTECTION IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND: Lightweight and non-intrusive pepper gel includes an adjustable hand strap for instant access; Perfect for running, this ¾ oz unit provides 35 bursts (5x Other Brands) for protection against multiple threats

BE PREPARED WITH FREE TRAINING: Feel confident with every SABRE self-defense product; Packaging includes links to free training videos and safety tips to help maximize your personal safety when in the face of danger

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
